text: læa ha kxallxhˌ ca thrng xea thosʹ mnusʹy neuxngcak khwam xthrrm khxng phwk khea phraxngkh ca mi thrng hı helux thing wi bn man (phændin) sung satw lok dı «tæ phraxngkh thrng prawing wela hı kæ phwk khea cnthung wela thi thuk kahnd wi meux wara khxng phwk khea di ma thung phwk khea ca prawing wela hı cha sak chawmong hnung k mi di læa phwk khea ca reng hı rew (sak chawmong hnung) k mi di
